TopicTitle: Is there a KSP Mod that can let you see other planets from Kerbin?

Articles.Content: I wanted to know if there was a mod that lets you see other planets and spacecraft from earth like in real life. I think this would add a lot of realism to the game.

Gaiiden beat me to it, but DOE is configurable, you can view just the planets in the sky (like on earth) or you can have hover-over text that tells you what planet it is.  It has some other features as well, all configurable.
